Question
========
  
When running multiple keys, the Bonferroni correction ensures that... 
Answerlist
----------
* The probability of performing at least one $H_0$ justifiable rejection remains approximately the same.
* The probability of rejecting at least one $H_0$ rightly NOT to reject remains approximately the same.
* The probability of rejecting at least one $H_0$ onjustifiable rejection remains approximately the same.
* The probability of rejecting at least one $H_0$ wrongfully NOT to reject remains about the same.
